abstract: There are a number of theories about why official Chinese media outlets are attacking Apple. And while many Chinese commentators online are mocking the state media, the company does appear to have a problem with Beijing.
snippet: There are a number of theories about why official Chinese media outlets are attacking Apple. And while many Chinese commentators online are mocking the state media, the company does appear to have a problem with Beijing.
lead_paragraph: The official Chinese media assault on Apple discussed in the previous China Insider column continued throughout the week.
